Dialogs.Text: MsMaki95: Oh, yeah! All done by this hands. >-o
SecurPink1850: Impressive, they all look quite well done.
MsMaki95: I mean, i put a lot of effort into it, but, they can be better! >-<
Thomas B: Judging by the type of answer and age of this place, this seems to be an actual user.
MsMaki95: Hehe, it seems you are going to fit right in when you meet the others. ^-^
SecurPink1850: Wait, how do you know i'm new? I didn't answer yet and i could be an alt account of... Someone else.
MsMaki95: Oh! Well, you don't know me and you didn't knew there were other people here. That's how i know. >-o
Thomas B: Hmph, smart one here.
